messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] katas
messages.msgSnippet: For years I thought Canada a wasteland. Imagine my surprise when I discovered it is the center of the sword art universe! http://www.uoguelph.ca/~iaido/ ...
messages.messageBody:
For years I thought Canada a wasteland. Imagine my surprise when I
discovered it is the center of the sword art universe!

http://www.uoguelph.ca/~iaido/


On Sep 7, 2004, at 9:02 PM, lonnierooks wrote:

> I am looking to learn katas for the katana the problem is i live in
> Canada and no were near a center that would have such training i do
> have a kata that my karate master made up but it is not traditional
> only practiced in our club so if anyone knows a good book or video or
> web site please tell me

messages.messageBody:
I am looking to learn katas for the katana the problem is i live in
Canada and no were near a center that would have such training i do
have a kata that my karate master made up but it is not traditional
only practiced in our club so if anyone knows a good book or video or
web site please tell me
